name: py-mkdocs

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator
that's geared towards building project documentation.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-markdown
dependencies.description:
This is a Python implementation of John Gruber's Markdown. It is almost
completely compliant with the reference implementation, though there are
a few very minor differences. See John's Syntax Documentation for the
syntax rules.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-watchdog
dependencies.description: Python library and shell utilities to monitor filesystem events.

dependencies.name: py-ghp-import
dependencies.description: Copy your docs directly to the gh-pages branch.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml-env-tag
dependencies.description: A custom YAML tag for referencing environment variables in YAML files.

dependencies.name: py-mergedeep
dependencies.description: A deep merge function for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-mkdocs-material
dependent_to.description:
Write your documentation in Markdown and create a professional static
site for your Open Source or commercial project in minutes.

dependent_to.name: py-mkdocs-autorefs
dependent_to.description: Automatically link across pages in MkDocs.

dependent_to.name: py-mkdocstrings
dependent_to.description: Automatic documentation from sources, for MkDocs.

dependent_to.name: py-mike
dependent_to.description:
mike is a Python utility to easily deploy multiple versions of your
MkDocs-powered docs to a Git branch, suitable for deploying to Github
via gh-pages.
